metadata.name: As her cells multiply
metadata.description:
As her cells multiply
Uncontrollably, unforgivingly
With my lungs, I cry
With hers, all is scary
 
Too young to comprehend
Too young to believe
Still can't understand the end
Still think all is deceive
 
Chemicals failing, hopes as well
My strength totem, weakened severely
Will medicines work, hoping time will tell
But time too is evil, false hopes surely
 
You can't be gone, I hug what's left
Crazy world we live, all this a test
The machine flatlines, me a victim of theft
I beg I cry, but god loves her best
 
This pain of lost, makes my chest bury
My queen gone, to this fickle endeavor
But in the grand scheme, death is temporary
Because within me, mama lives forever


------

This piece is dedicated to my late mother who lost her battle to lung cancer in 2015. I hope this piece encapsulates my pain of her loss and immortalizes her in memory. 

10% of profits will go to a cancer charity in my home country. Receipt on twitter.
